vera_returns.speaker: Narrator
vera_returns.text: Captain Vera has become a regular presence at the cafe. Today, she seems more talkative than usual, her eyes distant with memory.

vera_reminisce.speaker: Captain Vera
vera_reminisce.text: Twenty-three years I sailed. The Stormchaser was my home, my crew my family. We weathered things that would make seasoned sailors weep.

player_curious.speaker: Narrator
player_curious.text: Do you ask about her adventures?

choices.text: You must have incredible stories. I'd love to hear one.

vera_story.speaker: Captain Vera
vera_story.text: *Her eyes light up* There was the time we discovered a sea cavern filled with bioluminescent fish. Or when we outran pirates through a fog bank. Those were the good days...

vera_hesitates.speaker: Captain Vera
vera_hesitates.text: *Her expression darkens* That's... a story for another time. Some waves are harder to navigate than others.

vera_trails_off.speaker: Captain Vera
vera_trails_off.text: *She stares into her cup* Courage isn't about not being afraid. It's about sailing forward anyway. I used to know that. Somewhere along the way, I forgot.

vera_memory_end.speaker: Captain Vera
vera_memory_end.text: Thank you for listening. It's been... a long time since anyone wanted to hear an old captain's tales.
